attributes.action: Call for Transitional Protection for Skilled Worker Visa Holders on ILR Track
attributes.additional_details:
We ask the UK government to:

Maintain the 5-year ILR route for existing skilled workers in the UK.
Provide urgent clarity to reduce growing anxiety.
Honor the rules under which migrants arrived and built their lives.
attributes.background:
Help Skilled Visa Holders!
Say NO to changing ILR from 5 to 10 years retroactively.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
